message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with video captioning, which is a task related to computer vision (CV) and natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, cs.CV and cs.CL are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also involves mining multimodal topics and using them to guide the caption decoder, which falls under the category of multimodal learning (cs.MM). Additionally, the paper proposes a multi-task learning approach and an end-to-end optimization procedure, which are related to machine learning (cs.LG) and information retrieval (cs.IR), respectively.
